meaning_str.bing:
adv. 完全地；百分之百地；全部地；〈口〉确实
网络. 统统；完全的；真的很

完全地；百分之百地；全部地；〈口〉确实

完全地；全部地；全然地；彻底地；绝对地；十足地；整个地；无保留地

1.en: Like Archer, I also totally feel that the continent has not been a good host for my people.
1.cn: 正如Archer一样，我也完全觉得这个大陆对我的人民来说并不是一个好的主人。

2.en: Once it does, you will be in for a busy time keeping up with developments, as we are totally ready to fast forward our activities.
2.cn: 一旦达成，你们将经历一段忙碌的时期，为了很好的跟上进展速度，因为我们已经完全的准备好，以最快的速度行动。

3.en: Totally. Well, he felt all threatened and he thought he was a bad lover.
3.cn: 完全愤怒。嗯，他感到威胁而且他觉得自己是个糟糕的情人。

0.en: Totally and completely healthy. That is great. That is great.
0.cn: 完全彻底的健康。太棒了，太棒了。

1.en: Didn't it like totally speak to you? What book is this?
1.cn: 是不是完全说出你的心声？什么书啊？

2.en: I must have totally blanked on the part where I invited you over.
2.cn: 我完全不记得什么时候请你过来的。

3.en: I don't know, it would totally depend on her coloring and you got the job. Yes.
3.cn: 那完全要看她的肤色，而定你拿到那工作了！

4.en: And so that's a totally different experience for every person on the site.
4.cn: 而对于每个人来说，那就是一种完全不同的经历了。

5.en: Yeah, that's okay, I mean if you guys all have to go away for the first weekend I'm alone by myself, you know then I totally, totally understand.
5.cn: 没关系，我失恋的第一个周末，你们都要出城去，我完全可以理解。

6.en: Hey, if I wasn't engaged to Bernadette, that totally could have been me.
6.cn: 拜托，如果我没跟伯纳黛特订婚，二号选择完全可能是我。

7.en: I understand that and I totally respect you. I just, I don't pray to Ra, so…
7.cn: 这我理解，我完全敬重你。但我信奉的不是拉，所以……

8.en: Totally understandable. I'll ask again, what do you mean, "Don't beat myself up"?
8.cn: 完全理解。我再问一遍，什么叫，"别太难为自己"？

9.en: Why not? Brian likes you, which we totally don't understand, but... Jodes?
9.cn: 为什么不能？布莱恩喜欢你，对此我们完全不理解，乔妹，你来说吧？

10.en: No-no-no, I know, but you and I are different people though, and this is a totally different situation, and I know that I am not gonna regret this.
10.cn: 你不用说，我知道，不过你我是完全不同的人，而且情况也完全不同，我知道我这样做绝不会后悔。

11.en: You really are still hopeful? No, no, I'm not hopeful at all. He's totally bailed on the plan.
11.cn: 你还抱有希望吗？不，一点希望都没有，他完全没按计划的来。

12.en: Look, if you don't want me to come tonight, I totally understand. I could just... What?
12.cn: 嗯...如果你那晚不想我出现，我完全理解，我大不了... 什么？

13.en: I didn't make it. I'm sorry. I totally forgot about tonight and the fact that we're supposed to make the presents.
13.cn: 这不是我做的，对不起，我完全忘了今晚和做礼物的事。

14.en: OK, I totally support that. All you had to do was tell me. So where do you want to go? What's about the list?
14.cn: 好，我完全支持 。你直接告诉我就行了你想去哪儿？清单是什么？

15.en: I'd just like to say that I'm totally behind this experiment. In fact, I'd very much like to butter your head.
15.cn: 我想说我完全赞成这个实验，而且，我还非常想把你的脑袋涂上黄油。

16.en: In Interstellar, one of the most important features is the way that the science is totally embedded in the film.
16.cn: 在《星际穿越》中，最重要的特点之一就是科学完全嵌入影片的方式。

17.en: But look Chandler, right now, no one has a lower opinion of you than I do. But I totally believe you can do this.
17.cn: 听我说，钱德，现在没有人比我更看不起你，但我完全相信你做得到。

18.en: So when she came in, I got distracted and totally forgot about the camera. It kept rolling and recorded everything.
18.cn: 她一走进来，我完全忘记录影机的事，录影机一直在拍，录下了整个经过。

19.en: Thanks. So, it's strange, Sheldon was talking in his sleep last night, and he seemed like a totally different person.
19.cn: 谢谢。所以有件怪事，谢尔顿昨晚睡觉说梦话了，感觉他完全是另一个人。
